Articles.Content:
Im getting severe lag (slow down) when in the VAB scrolling the camera up or down.

Anyone else?

Edited April 20, 2016 by jrolson

I tried to warn them about it: http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/8865

I can't offer a solution because there simply isn't one.

Edited April 20, 2016 by smjjames
This is a different issue. Im talking about lag when scrolling up/down with the camera and not the parts list.

15 minutes ago, jrolson said:

This is a different issue. Im talking about lag when scrolling up/down with the camera and not the parts list.

Oh, you didn't mention the camera the first time.

The camera didn't seem laggy when I used the pre-release.

I turned off the VAB crew in the settings and camera movement seems smoother now...

Didn't have this problem before 1.1

I'm here to report the same issue.
Substantial framerate drop (from 60fps vsync max settings down to ~20fps) in fully upgraded VAB.

I say the fully upgraded VAB because I don't seem to have as much trouble in the teir1 VAB in career mode.

'Will try the suggested toggling off of "VAB crew" and hopefully it'll be a functional work-a-round for the time being.
